channel.title: Runescape barrows digging problem
channel.description:
well when i first downloaded this base the barrows were above the ground and im trying to make it so you dig on a hill and you go underneath to kill the barrows brother. Ive been following a tutorial but it tells me to add the digging case under
[code]public boolean CheckForSkillUse3(int Item, int Slot) {[/code] but i dont have this in my client.java. What should i do?

ok thank you very much sorry for being such a noob

item.title: Runescape barrows digging problem
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“chippeh, post:7, topic:308245”]pretty sure this is it, just add it in your potions.java if you have it

case 952: if(c.absX >= 3554 && c.absX <= 3559 && c.absY >= 3295 && c.absY <= 3300){ c.toX = 3578; c.toY = 9706; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3573 && c.absX <= 3577 && c.absY >= 3295 && c.absY <= 3300){ c.toX = 3556; c.toY = 9718; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3563 && c.absX <= 3567 && c.absY >= 3286 && c.absY <= 3290){ c.toX = 3557; c.toY = 9703; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3552 && c.absX <= 3555 && c.absY >= 3280 && c.absY <= 3284){ c.toX = 3568; c.toY = 9683; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3564 && c.absX <= 3567 && c.absY >= 3273 && c.absY <= 3277){ c.toX = 3546; c.toY = 9684; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3575 && c.absX <= 3579 && c.absY >= 3279 && c.absY <= 3284){ c.toX = 3534; c.toY = 9704; c.heightLevel = 3; } [/quote]Did you make that, because I just checked the one I made and it’s the exact same.

@ontopic

The code would also work in player.java, and that class is usually a little more comprehindeble to read.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape barrows digging problem
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

pretty sure this is it, just add it in your potions.java if you have it

case 952: if(c.absX >= 3554 && c.absX <= 3559 && c.absY >= 3295 && c.absY <= 3300){ c.toX = 3578; c.toY = 9706; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3573 && c.absX <= 3577 && c.absY >= 3295 && c.absY <= 3300){ c.toX = 3556; c.toY = 9718; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3563 && c.absX <= 3567 && c.absY >= 3286 && c.absY <= 3290){ c.toX = 3557; c.toY = 9703; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3552 && c.absX <= 3555 && c.absY >= 3280 && c.absY <= 3284){ c.toX = 3568; c.toY = 9683; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3564 && c.absX <= 3567 && c.absY >= 3273 && c.absY <= 3277){ c.toX = 3546; c.toY = 9684; c.heightLevel = 3; } if(c.absX >= 3575 && c.absX <= 3579 && c.absY >= 3279 && c.absY <= 3284){ c.toX = 3534; c.toY = 9704; c.heightLevel = 3; }

You see, the code here has a range you are within, if you use the “dig” option within these areas, it will teleport you to the areas enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape barrows digging problem
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Easyest way is to use the cheapass method I used.

Find where your food is handled, under make it

Case (Spade ID):
if (playerHasItem, SpadeID && absX = hill coordX, absY = hill coordY);
teleportToX = barrows room coord;
teleportToY = barrows room coord;

I think that’s right, I wrote that off memory so don’t expect it to be perfect.

Read full topic
